qmonitor.title: Question monitor help
qmonitor.text: This module monitors a channel for comments in the form of a question. Non-questions will be removed on channels where this module is actively monitoring. In the case of a removal, the user will be notified over PM that their comment had ben removed.

queries.SET_SETTINGS: INSERT INTO `channel` (`channelID`, `channelName`, `serverID`, `serverName`, `qmonitor`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `channelName`=VALUES(`channelName`), `serverID`=VALUES(`serverID`), `serverName`=VALUES(`serverName`), `qmonitor`=VALUES(`qmonitor`)
